user_query: I'm planning a stargazing trip with my friends and we need some information about stars. Can you provide a list of stars with a minimum distance of 50 light years and a maximum apparent magnitude of 5? Also, give us the basic astrological details based on our birth dates and times.

TaskList.description: Query a database for stars that have a minimum distance of 50 light years and a maximum apparent magnitude of 5.
Gather basic astrological details based on the provided birth dates and times of the friends.
